CCRC_KPI_PMA1.Measure: Failure Ratio for DNS_Server Service (DNS_Server FR)
CCRC_KPI_PMA1.SQL1: declare @time varchar(50) = DATETIME_VALUE declare @moid varchar(200) = UNIQUE_ID_VALUE select CAST(ROUND(avg(result), 2) AS NUMERIC(36,2)) AS kpiValue from(select(((SUM(DC_E_PCC_MOBILITY_MM_E_RAW.VS_MM_ATTPSPAGING_E)-SUM(DC_E_PCC_MOBILITY_MM_E_RAW.VS_MM_PSPAGINGRESTARTBASEDONARPATT_E)-SUM(DC_E_PCC_MOBILITY_MM_E_RAW.VS_MM_SUCCPSPAGING_E))+SUM(DC_E_PCC_MOBILITY_MM_E_RAW.VS_MM_UNSUCCSERVICEREQUESTMT_E)+SUM(DC_E_PCC_MOBILITY_MM_E_RAW.VS_MM_UNSUCCICSRINSERVICEREQUESTMT_E)+SUM(DC_E_PCC_MOBILITY_MM_E_RAW.VS_MM_UNSUCCMBRINSERVICEREQUESTMT_E))/(SUM(DC_E_PCC_MOBILITY_MM_E_RAW.VS_MM_ATTPSPAGING_E)-SUM(DC_E_PCC_MOBILITY_MM_E_RAW.VS_MM_PSPAGINGRESTARTBASEDONARPATT_E))) as result from DC_E_PCC_MOBILITY_MM_E_RAW where datetime_id = @time and MOID = @moid)A

CCRC_KPI_PMA2.Measure: Failure Ratio for DNS_Provision Service (DNS_Provision FR)
CCRC_KPI_PMA2.SQL1: declare @time varchar(50) = DATETIME_VALUE declare @moid varchar(200) = UNIQUE_ID_VALUE select CAST(ROUND(avg(result), 2) AS NUMERIC(36,2)) AS kpiValue from(select(((SUM(DC_E_PCC_MOBILITY_MM_E_RAW.VS_MM_ATTPSPAGING_E)-SUM(DC_E_PCC_MOBILITY_MM_E_RAW.VS_MM_PSPAGINGRESTARTBASEDONARPATT_E)-SUM(DC_E_PCC_MOBILITY_MM_E_RAW.VS_MM_SUCCPSPAGING_E))+SUM(DC_E_PCC_MOBILITY_MM_E_RAW.VS_MM_UNSUCCSERVICEREQUESTMT_E)+SUM(DC_E_PCC_MOBILITY_MM_E_RAW.VS_MM_UNSUCCICSRINSERVICEREQUESTMT_E)+SUM(DC_E_PCC_MOBILITY_MM_E_RAW.VS_MM_UNSUCCMBRINSERVICEREQUESTMT_E))/(SUM(DC_E_PCC_MOBILITY_MM_E_RAW.VS_MM_ATTPSPAGING_E)-SUM(DC_E_PCC_MOBILITY_MM_E_RAW.VS_MM_PSPAGINGRESTARTBASEDONARPATT_E))) as result from DC_E_PCC_MOBILITY_MM_E_RAW where datetime_id = @time and MOID = @moid)A

CCRC_KPI_PMA4.Measure: TPS KPI for DNS_Provision Service (DNS_Provision TPS)
CCRC_KPI_PMA4.SQL1: declare @time varchar(50) = DATETIME_VALUE declare @moid varchar(200) = UNIQUE_ID_VALUE select CAST(ROUND(avg(result), 2) AS NUMERIC(36,2)) AS kpiValue from(select(((SUM(DC_E_PCC_MOBILITY_MM_E_RAW.VS_MM_ATTPSPAGING_E)-SUM(DC_E_PCC_MOBILITY_MM_E_RAW.VS_MM_PSPAGINGRESTARTBASEDONARPATT_E)-SUM(DC_E_PCC_MOBILITY_MM_E_RAW.VS_MM_SUCCPSPAGING_E))+SUM(DC_E_PCC_MOBILITY_MM_E_RAW.VS_MM_UNSUCCSERVICEREQUESTMT_E)+SUM(DC_E_PCC_MOBILITY_MM_E_RAW.VS_MM_UNSUCCICSRINSERVICEREQUESTMT_E)+SUM(DC_E_PCC_MOBILITY_MM_E_RAW.VS_MM_UNSUCCMBRINSERVICEREQUESTMT_E))/(SUM(DC_E_PCC_MOBILITY_MM_E_RAW.VS_MM_ATTPSPAGING_E)-SUM(DC_E_PCC_MOBILITY_MM_E_RAW.VS_MM_PSPAGINGRESTARTBASEDONARPATT_E))) as result from DC_E_PCC_MOBILITY_MM_E_RAW where datetime_id = @time and MOID = @moid)A
